title: Rory Sutherland Went to Great Lengths to Track Down His Retro Rabobank Colnago Dream B-Stay Team Bike
content:
Rory Sutherland tracked down the Colnago from his first year on the Rabobank development team and has (mostly) restored it to its 2002 glory.

Read the full article at Rory Sutherland Went to Great Lengths to Track Down His Retro Rabobank Colnago Dream B-Stay Team Bike on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
